DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. The aim of this research is to compare the efficacy and safety of treatment with NPH insulin and insulin detemir. You will be treated with either insulin detemir or NPH insulin once or twice daily as basal insulin. Additionally you will receive insulin aspart as bolus insulin
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of NPH Insulin and Insulin Detemir in Children and Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Insulin detemir naive Type 1 diabetes for at least 12 months HbA1c lesser than or equal to 11.0% Significant concomitant diseases
